page.title: 19School life and spare time
page.content: My name is Karen Cummings.I go to Treowen school;there are 167 children and eight teachers.I like using the computers.Soon we are going to Butlins near Pwllheli for a trip.We also go to Theatre Hafren for things like the Pandemonium Theatre.I go to Brownies on Mondays,to five to eight club on Tuesdays and I also go roller skating. Hello,my name is Jasmin.I have the same hobbies and clubs as Karen but I {collect rubbers and my very best hobby is swimming. My school day starts at 8.25 with {the early morning computer club.There is a queue at the door waiting.I also like badminton and clay modelling.Once I made a clay model of a cricket player with a small wooden bat.
